QuestData.Title: Clearing the Defiled
QuestData.Description: Our Earthen Ring friends here are wondering if we can lend them a hand. There are faceless down below in the Scalding Chasm that are defiling all of the wildlife.$B$BCan you take care of that for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any 8 Crushing Eels, Deep Remoras, or Chasm Stalkers.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm going to need you to kill a few more of those things. The shamans here are very particular about it. You'd think they were druids.
QuestData.RewardText: Good enough for me.$B$BDon't get too complacent, $n. The hard part's about to come.
